items.title: Fashion's most hated garment — the skinny jean — is making a comeback

items.title: Even at $8 million per Super Bowl commercial, ad executives say it's still bang for your buck
items.content: Some advertisers are shelling out up to $8 million for a 30-second spot on this year's Super Bowl. Industry experts say the high price tag is still worth it.
items.contentSnippet: Some advertisers are shelling out up to $8 million for a 30-second spot on this year's Super Bowl. Industry experts say the high price tag is still worth it.

items.title: Beauty stocks post major losses after a week of worrying results

items.title: Fast-food fortunes: How the families behind Chick-fil-A, Panda Express manage their wealth

items.title: A $50 million Ferrari-inspired mansion just broke a local record in Delray Beach, Florida. Take a look inside
